Welcome to the DroidPlanner wiki!

**Tower Features**
* [Tower Widgets](https://github.com/DroidPlanner/Tower/wiki/Tower-Widgets)
  * [Custom video stream](https://github.com/DroidPlanner/Tower/wiki/Custom-video-stream)
  * [UVC video stream](https://github.com/DroidPlanner/Tower/wiki/Uvc-video-stream)
  * [Streaming raspi camera video](https://github.com/DroidPlanner/Tower/wiki/Streaming-raspi-camera-video-to-Tower-video-widget)
* [Offline maps](https://github.com/Droidplanner/droidplanner/wiki/Offline-Maps)
